channel.title: Yoga on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Yoga on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Caterpillar Yoga
item.description: A caterpillar tried yoga one day, With many legs stretched out to play, It twisted and turned, New poses it learned, A flexible worm on display.

item.title: Elephant Yoga
item.description: An elephant joined a yoga class, With trunk and a large, hefty mass, It stretched and it bent, With such grace, time well spent, A flexible giant, first-class.

item.title: Kangaroo Yoga
item.description: A kangaroo tried out some yoga, Its balance, quite like a tightrope-a, With a hop and a stretch, It found quite the fetch, A marsupial zen-like persona.

item.title: Ninja Yoga
item.description: A ninja found peace in a pose, With yoga, a calm juxtapose, In silence and stealth, A focus of wealth, A warrior’s zen state, it shows.
